props.alt: Alternate text for screen readers. Leave empty for decorative images.
props.aspectRatio: Calculated as `width/height`, so for a 1920x1080px image this will be `1.7778`. Will be calculated automatically if omitted.
props.cover: Resizes the background image to cover the entire container.
props.eager: Will force the components content to render on mounted. This is useful if you have content that will not be rendered in the DOM that you want crawled for SEO.
props.lazySrc:
Something to show while waiting for the main image to load, typically a small base64-encoded thumbnail. Has a slight blur filter applied.

Use [vuetify-loader](https://github.com/vuetifyjs/vuetify-loader) to generate automatically.
props.options: Options that are passed to the [Intersection observer](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/Intersection_Observer_API) constructor.
props.position: Overrides the default to change which parts get cropped off. Uses the same syntax as [`background-position`](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/CSS/background-position).
props.src: The image URL. This prop is mandatory.
props.srcset: A set of alternate images to use based on device size. [Read more...](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/img#attr-srcset).
props.transition: The transition to use when switching from `lazy-src` to `src`.

slots.placeholder: Display an overlay while the image is loading
slots.error: Will be shown if the image fails to load, replacing the placeholder slot
slots.sources: A list of `` elements. If this slot is used v-img will render a `` instead of ``

events.error: Emitted if the image fails to load
events.load: Emitted when the image is loaded
events.loadstart: Emitted when the image starts to load
